get.summary: Get NHL Teams standings by division and conference.
get.description: Retrieves NHL team standings for the current day. Sorted by division and conference. Always use the current date in the format YYYY-MM-DD. Standings are found by using the leagueSequence, conferenceSequence, divisionSequence, and the points property values.

parameters.name: date
parameters.description: Use the current date in the format YYYY-MM-DD. Ask for the current date in that format if unsure.

get.summary: Gets NHL players general landing page info.
get.description: Retrieves NHL players general career information and data using their playerId which must first be found using the operationId: NHL_players. Find information such as name, birthday, height, weight, isactive, awards, jersey number, etc. Only use leagueAbbrev = "NHL"

parameters.name: playerId
parameters.description: This must be first obtained from the operationId: NHL_players and then used here.

get.summary: Gets NHL players detailed game logs for regular season and playoffs.
get.description: Retrieves NHL players detailed game by game stats using their playerId which must first be found using the operationId: NHL_players. Use the gameLog property to find the game by game stats for a given season.

parameters.name: playerId
parameters.description: This must be first obtained from the operationId: NHL_players and then used here.

parameters.name: seasonId
parameters.description: Use the current seasonId. Ask for the current seasonId if unsure.

parameters.name: gameTypeId
parameters.description: gameTypeId=2 is regular season, gameTypeId=3 is playoffs. Assume regular season if unsure or ask.
